dash.notActiv: There are no classes for today!

admin.name_edit: The name of the group ([Only when adding] You can write the name of the groups separated by a semicolon [;], for multiple addition)
admin.aud_edit: Audience number ([Only when adding] You can write audience numbers separated by semicolons [;], for multiple addition)
admin.activity_edit: Class type ([Only when adding] You can record the types of classes separated by semicolons [;], for multiple addition)
admin.direction_edit: The direction of preparation ([Only when adding] You can write the directions of preparation separated by a semicolon [;], for multiple addition)
admin.teacher_edit: Teacher ([Only when adding] You can write the full name of teachers separated by semicolons [;], for multiple additions)
admin.discipline_edit: The name of the discipline ([Only when adding] You can write the name of the discipline with a semicolon [;], for multiple addition)
admin.academic_year_edit: Academic year ([Only when adding] You can record academic years separated by semicolons [;], for multiple additions)
admin.fio_edit: Student's full name (Students' full names can be separated by semicolons [;], for multiple addition)
admin.chooseYCS: Choose academic year, course and semester
admin.enterTeacher: Enter the full name of the teacher
admin.enterDiscipline: Enter the name of the discipline
admin.enterHoursLecture: Enter the number of lecture hours
admin.enterHoursLabor: Enter the number of laboratory hours
admin.enterHoursPractice: Enter the number of practical hours
admin.enterHoursRK: Enter the number of milestone hours
admin.enterHoursControl: Enter the number of control hours
admin.enterHoursCourseWork: Enter the number of course hours
admin.enterHoursConsul: Enter the number of consulting hours
admin.enterHoursExam: Enter the number of exam hours
admin.enterHoursCredit: Enter the number of credit hours
admin.enterHoursCreditAsses: Enter the number of hours of credits with the score

admin.notifyChanData: The data has been successfully changed.
admin.notifyDelData: The data has been successfully deleted.
